DIY衣服教程

1 DIY有3个物品，织物，纽扣，套筒




2014-10-02_10.17.38.png (120.69 KB, 下载次数: 183)

下载附件

2014-10-2 10:41 上传







2 2个羊毛竖着放可以得到4个织物，然后织物可以用任意染料染色




2.png (178.96 KB, 下载次数: 172)

下载附件

2014-10-2 10:42 上传

更新内容
v1.2.1

Fixed carpet bug - you can now craft carpets
Fixed hat insta-death bug
v1.2.0

Added colorable hats
Added a way to craft brown fabric without using cocoa beans (white fabric + clay)
Added more colors for buttons
Shirts can now have a button color

You can now craft dye-crafted fabric by putting the two colors of wool in the crafting grid (e.g. yellow wool + yellow wool = yellow fabric)
You can now craft two-fabric-crafted fabric by putting the two colors of wool in the crafting grid (e.g. red wool + white wool = pink fabric)

Added a configuration for whether there shouldn't be armor in clothing (false by default)
Added a configuration for whether clay to brown fabric crafting should be enabled (true by default)
Fixed a bug where the clothing has a durability bar

v1.1.1

Fixed bug where clothing has diamond armor stats and can be broken
Added some more fabric crafting recipes

v1.1.0

Added shirt sleeves and shirts can now have sleeve colors. As a result, shirts are slightly more expensive.

v1.0.0

Initial release; colorable pants, shirts, and shoes are available for playing with.
